attributes.action: De-criminalise the act of suicide, and in addition to this allow euthanasia in certain circumstances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If an individual "owns" the right to life, as set out buy the Human Rights Act, they should also have the right not to excersise that option, in the same way as an arrsted person has the right to remain silent but can opt to waive that right. A full, thorough debate about euthanasia is also needed in Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
